review_text: This is my first Kora product ever after wanting to try the brand for years. This is the best product to start with. The word mushroom intrigued me a lot because I know it‚Äôs hydrating. It removes makeup very well without stripping the skin or burning my eyes! Product was gifted by Kora Organics.

unique_id: KORA ORGANICS BY MIRANDA KERR-Milky Mushroom Gentle Cleansing Oil
review_text: Kota organic gifted me thr milky cleanser which I am in love with! It is so so moisturizing keeps my skin soft and hydrated love how the texture becomes so milky! I honestly love organic products because they are safe to use in skin

unique_id: KORA ORGANICS BY MIRANDA KERR-Milky Mushroom Gentle Cleansing Oil
review_text: I received this cleansing oil complimentary from Kora Organics in exchange for an honest review. I‚Äôve been enjoying this cleanser because it‚Äôs gentle and nonstripping. It‚Äôs a great first cleanser as it melts light makeup, sunscreen and dirt away. I love that the ingredients are very nourishing too. Must try!

unique_id: KORA ORGANICS BY MIRANDA KERR-Milky Mushroom Gentle Cleansing Oil
review_text: Complimentary from KORA Organics. The Milky Mushroom Gentle Cleansing Oil is amazing! Packaging and glass bottle is so pretty. It has a light scent. The consistency isn‚Äôt too runny. I have dry/dull skin. I love how it hydrates and gives my skin a glow! It also removed my eyebrow pomade very well compared to other cleansers I‚Äôve used.

unique_id: KORA ORGANICS BY MIRANDA KERR-Milky Mushroom Gentle Cleansing Oil
review_text:
** I received the product complimentary from KORA Organics.

First of all, I love the luxurious glass bottle packaging, although I do have to be careful shaking it so I don't drop it! The biphase formula mixes well and 3 pumps is enough for my whole face. I love the light oil texture, it doesn't feel thick or heavy and is easy to spread on the skin. Don't care for the lavender oil scent but that's just my personal preference. 

As for its cleansing power, I would use something stronger for waterproof makeup, but otherwise this removed light makeup well and didn't leave a film behind. Feels extremely gentle and comfortable on the skin too!

unique_id: KORA ORGANICS BY MIRANDA KERR-Milky Mushroom Gentle Cleansing Oil
review_title: Kora Organics By Miranda Kerr Milky Mushroom Gentle Cleansing Oil
review_text:
Complimentary from Kora Organics 

I received this product as a PR gift, however I dont think it is strong enough to remove the makeup and its hard to shake the liquid it requires some muscle work until blended.

unique_id: KORA ORGANICS BY MIRANDA KERR-Milky Mushroom Gentle Cleansing Oil
review_text: This cleanser was complimentary from Kora Organics in exchange for my honest review. Kora Organics nailed the luxe skincare vibes with this cleanser and I was immediately impressed with its heavy glass bottle and beautiful branding. The Milky Mushroom Gentle Cleansing Oil is a dual-phase cleanser that promises to remove your makeup and cleanse your skin all in one step. At first, I made the mistake of applying this on dry skin, like a traditional cleansing oil and while it worked it wasn't quite as effective. This cleanser is meant to be used on damp skin. This will remove minimal sunscreen and makeup but I had trouble removing heavier mascara so I don't think this will work for everyone as an effective makeup remover. It has an herbal, spa-inspired scent and no added fragrance which I quite like but I can see others disliking the smell of it. It does leave a slight moisturizing feel on the skin after rinsing, so if that's not your thing I don't think you will like this cleanser. I am an avid double cleanser and I prefer this one for my morning cleanse as I like a really deep clean at night.

This cleanser has a subtle pleasant scent and it is gentle. It doesn‚Äôt strip out all the moisture and natural oil from your face like many other cleansers, but still does a good job cleansing. I personally don‚Äôt like that squeaky clean feeling because that means the cleanser is too harsh and stripped out your skin. This cleanser does not do that! Plus it comes in a big tube!

this is the first cleanser that I've brought that actually does what it says. it does take away all makeup. no more panda eyes. it is a little bit drying, but perks up with moisturiser. really amazing clean skin
Holy grail cleanser for sensitive, inflamed, acne prone skin. It‚Äôs a true gel consistency and doesn‚Äôt foam. It‚Äôs gentle and soothing but very effective in terms of cleaning

I have been using this cleanser for years - it is gentle and works well on my combination dry/oily skin. You definitely need to use an eye make-up remover and occasionally double cleanse for night make-up but it's a great every day/night cleanser. My only issue is that it is hard to find in the 500ml pump bottle.
This cleanser is very gentle but it doesn‚Äôt foam at all so leaving me feeling my face is not being cleaned. Maybe good second cleanser for double cleansing. Will not repurchase
I‚Äôve been using this cleanser for many months now and I absolutely love it, it soothes my skin and isn‚Äôt overly drying or harsh. So cost effective and 1 bottle lasts a long time
is a natural compound that helps protect the skin barrier and prevents irritation from retinol

I am not in love with this - I know that it‚Äôs not  a foaming wash but I feel like I have to use a tonne of it in order for it to clean my skin. It has no fragrance and it‚Äôs a clear gel so it just makes the whole experience of cleansing a bit boring. I won‚Äôt repurchase.

This cleanser is simply one of the weirdest cleansers I have ever used. It has a gel texture which melted into water when I rubbed it on my face but because it had become so watery it drained away so quickly before I could even finish cleaning my face. I ended up using a lot of it each time I cleaned my face and what made it even worse was that my face didn‚Äôt feel clean afterwards and needed a second cleanse - I don‚Äôt usually wear make up so I never had this problem of double cleansing with almost all other cleansers apart from Tata Harpers cleansers but Tata Harpers cleansers don‚Äôt ‚Äòdrain away‚Äô when they emulsify like this one. Luckily I only got a trial size, another questionable product from Alpha H
I love that this is a gel. I always feel like it‚Äôs cleans my skin really well without leaving any oily residue. I keep purchasing it, so I must like it!
When I ordered this I didn't realise it was going to be so big. It comes in a large tube and it will last a long time. It has no scent and it is not soapy.

Hmm even though I love the smell, Im not sure if it really cleans my face well. Becoz of gel texture, I feel it‚Äôs not suitable for using with Foreo. Good thing is that it doesn‚Äôt make my sensitive skin break out. Anyway, I would not repurchase it.

I‚Äôve gotten into the routine of a second cleanse, I use this Alpha-H Cleanser first and I pair it with the Ole Henrikson AHA Cleanser. My combination skin has never looked better. Over course dealing with the monthly hormonal breakouts but this product has really set the standard for my skin care.
i work during this pandemic era with my PPE always on but this product actually works. I have less acne despite being in a heat. and this is my second purchased.

review_title: Been using this for almost 15 years
review_text:
Been using this since I was 15. So nearly 15 years.. (thanks for the recommendation mum)
It is my staple, will never be with out it. So many things have come and gone from my routines over the years but this isn't going anywhere.  Having sensitive acne prone skin, for years this cleanser had been the one thing I could always rely on. 
Super gentle. Australian made. Great reliable product!  Highly recommend

I will use this forever! The smell is so soothing. The gel texture feels calming and removes every speck of makeup, including mascara, and doesn‚Äôt sting my eyes. Balances out my combination skin. Packaging even looks so clean on a countertop. Only thing I would change is the way the product has to be distributed by unscrewing the bulky cap each time, so it can get a little messy putting the cap back on.
This is a good, simple cleanser. Removes make-up well and leaves skin feeling plump and fresh. It would be good to see Alpha-H move to more sustainable packaging.
this is my first time and i love using this cleanser. its a very gentle gel cleanser yet effective. i would not mind repurchasing this again in the future.

This is my absolute favourite cleanser. The non-foaming aspect was a bit strange to get used to at first, but it does the job just as well and feels so gentle and beautiful on my skin. Would recommend!
Compliments of Influenster, I really enjoyed this cleanser. Super gentle, smells great, highly recommended!
Good product, wish it foamed up a little bit more. Isn‚Äôt the best at getting makeup off, but is good for an everyday cleanser as I don‚Äôt wear makeup daily.

i buy this cleanser juz want to try it since i love the rose cleanser(from annyversary kit) .... overall is ok,it's not produce the foam since it in gel texture...  make me feel not sure either it is really clean my face or not.. but it doesnt breakout my skin...

Love this cleanser. I have sensitive skin, that was prone to breaking out. Since using this cleanser morning and night, the redness in my skin has calmed down and my breakouts have definitely reduced.

I was introduced to Alpha-H years ago by a beautician while living in Australia. This brand will always be one of my favourites, they have so many amazing products!

I really like this cleanser. It cleans every speck of dirt and makeup off my skin. As I have combination skin I need a delicate balance of hydration and removing excess oil. This cleanser does the job. I do not feel tight but I feel perfectly balanced and clean. I will repurchase again for sure! 

Cons - it tastes terrible, don't get it in your mouth!

Not drying, and cleans the skin really nicely. Need to use a fair bit to get it all over the skin because it doesn‚Äôt lather. If you don‚Äôt remove your makeup before using this, it won‚Äôt remove it for you.
First time trying the brand. Hope it does not cause any breakout. Travel friendly and the ingredients look promising. So far it makes my skin feel hydrated after cleansing.
No foams, very gentle cleanser. Doesn't strip off skin excess oil. It's suitable for all skin type. May give it a try. Hopes to see result soon, just started using it.
Love. My skin feels fresh, not raw and has helped me maintain a lack of break outs. I love the consistency and I use every night, it‚Äôs great for getting rid of makeup residue.

For me, it‚Äôs not a good cleanser. It doesn‚Äôt clean my face very well. Used it after make up remover, and still found makeup residues on my toner‚Äôs cotton pad after washing my face with this cleanser. The only thing I like about it is that it has no foam, no colour & no fragrance. However, Perhaps I‚Äôll just get myself Cetaphil instead. Won‚Äôt repurchase.

This is officially my go to cleanser for every day use. It‚Äôs really helped clear my skin (along with other Alpha-H products) but is still gentle enough that I haven‚Äôt had an adverse effects. Highly recommend.
This cleanser is gentle and light, non pore clogging and balanced

Really nice cleanser. Doesn‚Äôt have a lot of fragrance or irritants like a lot of cleansers have so you can cleanse your skin without worrying about irritating breakouts or anything like that. Love that it is a non-AHA product so I can use my BHA products without clashing with other acids

This cleanser tends to dry out my skin and my skin doesn‚Äôt feel soft after using. It is a clear thick cleanser that with my sensitive skin they do not compliment each other. But for someone with more ‚Äúnormal‚Äù skin it would do wonders

I have combo/oily, reactive skin. I can't use foaming cleansers because they dehydrate my skin and have a tendency to break me out. I mostly use this as my second cleanse in the evening and while very gentle, I feel like it does a good job of cleansing my skin without stripping it. It also hasn't caused any breakouts. I have tried using it to remove makeup, which it does work for, but it did sting my eyes a little so I wouldn't really recommend it for that. Overall I think it's a good buy if you have acne-prone skin or any issues with harsh, foaming cleansers.

review_title: Pleasantly surprised! Wish I tried Farmacy sooner
review_text:
First time to try this brand and product tonight and I am already loving it!
For reference, my skin type is EXTREMELY sensitive and dry, has redness and uneven skin tone. I was a bit skeptical to try this product as I have been using The Ordinary's Squalane cleanser for the past year or so but felt my skin needed a change. Decided to give this brand and product a try and honestly wish that I had done this sooner! Here is my opinion on the product so far:

Farmacy
Clean Bee Ultra Gentle Facial Cleanser

PROS
- little to no scent
- (as product states) does not lather however, is very thick/rich
- removed my makeup completely! 
- no skin irritation
- when I washed it off, left my face feeling squeaky clean without it being dry
--- face was also supple and bouncy
- cruelty-free!

CONS
- quite expensive for the size
- no other cons as of now, but will update if anything comes up as I continue to use this

review_title: Farmacy Clean Bee Ultra-Gentle Facial Cleanser
review_text: Great product. Leaves my face feeling refreshed and I have been using this product for over a year.
i‚Äôve been using this cleanser forever absolutely love it

I love this facial cleanser. I use it daily after the cleansing balm & it‚Äôs amazing. At first it did sting my skin a little, but my skin always reacts that way with new products like this. I also love how long a single bottle will last me. I purchased this bottle last year & I still have enough to last me month. I use one pump daily which I put in my wet hand before applying to my face. I don‚Äôt find that it has a specific smell, but maybe that‚Äôs because I‚Äôm used to it. I will definitely be purchasing another bottle once I finish mine! Awesome product, really underrated in this line.

review_title: Farmacy Clean Bee Ultra-Gentle Facial Cleanser
review_text: The product itself is nice but the smell is probably the worst smell I've ever smelt from a cleanser, far too overwhelming. Will be returning.
Would be great on normal skin, but seems a tad drying on my sensitive skin.
Super cute packaging and given that it foams you could probably use it for quite a while. Bought it during a sale and I‚Äôd say it‚Äôs a worth it purchase. Bottle super solid too.

My fave gel cleansers are YTTP Kale and Krave Matcha. I've been using this Bee cleanser as a second cleanse after oil for makeup removal. First, it smells like putting honey on my face. Personally, not for me. It quickly evolves to an ivory soap smell. While not stripping like an acid cleanser, this still leaves my combo skin feeling slightly dry and tight.

Its really gentle as the name says it. It lathers easily but maybe because I pump too much. Accidently pump 3 times. So maybe next time will be less than that. I use it together after the cleansing balm. Works well. But maybe this cleanser feels too light for my liking that I felt like my skin is not clean enough. But maybe next time I‚Äôll pair it with my cleansing wipes amd see how it goes. Other than that, it‚Äôs good.

i have a honeybee tattoo so it only felt right that i buy this cleanser, just to see if it was meant to be! and truly, it was. this one lathers a bit, don‚Äôt let the advertising fool you. it‚Äôs soap! but it doesn‚Äôt strip my skin and leaves it feeling as if i‚Äôve just exfoliated. it‚Äôs very gentle and easy to work with. the packaging is cute too! love a little yellow cleanser :)
I have combo skin and some foam cleansers can be too harsh on my skin. This leaves my skin feeling clean and very soft. It does a great job in washing away makeup and does not irritate my skin.

Perfectly gentle, with a good lather and incredible scent.  I have very reactive/sensitive skin, redness-prone skin, and this face wash is gentle enough to use twice a day.  The scent smells wonderful.  I'm definitely obsessed with this cleanser- and highly recommend it.

review_title: Farmacy Clean Bee Ultra-Gentle Facial Cleanser
review_text: In love with this cleanser. Very gentle, it‚Äôs not stripping to my skin. The light honey smell is so nice. I definitely want to repurchase!

Love the honey smell. I do feel like it cleans and tones, though works best after exfoliating. The only reason I give it one less star is because it does sting a little if it gets in your eyes but is gentle on the rest of my face.
Extremely sudsy and soft smelling the honey is very apparent but with a soapy after scent. Will be repurchasing because it has been a great cleanser

review_title: Farmacy Clean Bee Ultra-Gentle Facial Cleanser
review_text: So I was purchased this on recommendation for my dry skin. I did like how my skin felt after it - it felt oily (in a light nice oily way - not uncomfortable oily), only reason I didn't stick with it was the fragrance - it does have a strong honey fragrance, which I felt bit overwhelming. But great product overall!

i love the product itself but the packaging is just awful. the pump does not lock and about half of this product has leaked out of the bottle. should not be the case for an almost 30 dollar cleanser:/

review_title: Farmacy Clean Bee Ultra-Gentle Facial Cleanser
review_text: this is such a gentle cleanser that works amazingly! theres a noticeable difference in my skin texture when i use this product, it really cleans well without being irritating. have been using it for a while (im on my second bottle) and it works a lot better when partnered with a cleansing balm to remove makeup.

I can only use gentle cleansers because of my sensitive rosacea skin. I had been using the Fresh Soy cleanser for the past 2 years, but I noticed recently that it left my forehead feeling tight. So, I wanted to try something else, and my research led me to the Farmacy Clean Bee!
Positives: not only is this labeled a gentle cleanser, but it is also targeted for dry skin types, like myself! While i still feel like I definitely need to follow up with moisturizer, it does leave my skin feeling refreshed and clean. Added bonus, this cleanser comes with a pump! I prefer to cleanse in the shower, so this makes it so easy. 
The ONLY slight negative i have noticed, is that i sometimes feel like i have to really rinse it off well. The lather is nice, don‚Äôt get me wrong. It doesn‚Äôt foam up super crazy, just enough. But one time when i rinsed my face and went to dry it, i still had some lather under my chin and on my neck. No one else has mentioned this though, so this could be an error i am making, because i did use more product that one time. 
While this isn‚Äôt a negative for me personally, it is worth noting that if you are sensitive to smells, I would stop at Sephora and smell a tester in person before you buy. It isn‚Äôt added fragrance, it is natural, but it can be quite strong. Personally i think this smells better than the Fresh Soy cleanser. 
Overall, this is a nice cleanser, and will definitely be part of my cleansing rotation. I have had this less than a week, so unless this starts to break me out, i will definitely repurchase this!

I needed something to help with dry winter skin but this cleanser broke me out so badly I had to return it. I stopped using it and my skin cleared but when I added it to my AM routine I broke out again with little pimples. My skin still felt a bit dry after using this, so that was interesting seeing how this is a hydrating cleanser. I wanted to love it because the ingredients seemed like a good idea and I love the cleansing balm but Clean Bee wasn't for my skin type.
I didn‚Äôt really notice any difference so i don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs worth the money. Even though i love this brand especially the mask and the face oil
The cleanser does what it claims- gentle formulation that won‚Äôt make the face feel stripping after the cleansing. However the smell comes off WAY too strong.

review_title: Farmacy Clean Bee Ultra-Gentle Facial Cleanser
review_text: If you have dry skin and are looking for a clean product this one is definitely a winner! As the description says it is a gentle cleanser so it will not strip the skin. Since it is has more of a gel consistency just be sure to throughly wash it off. Love using this right after Farmacy‚Äôs Green Clean! I‚Äôm on my 2nd bottle right now!

review_title: 3 years, and I still love this face wash!
review_text:
I am slowly making the shift to green beauty products and I absolutely LOVE this cleanser. Often times, facial washes make my skin dry and tight, but this one leaves my skin feeling soft and supple and ready for a layer of moisturizer. I am on my 3rd bottle now since 2019 and I maybe buy this product twice a year - a little goes a long way! I use less than half a pump. 

When I first started using this product, I had to adjust to it. Something about it would make my eyes very sensitive, and sting slightly - an interesting effervescence, not unlike what a minty cleanser might do... except this isn't minty. Hard to explain. I have since adjusted to that, and otherwise have had no sensitivities to this product. The smell is mild and earthy with notes of honey. It's become a staple in my beauty routine and I love it!

formulations for various skin concerns. "
I love cleansing oil, and I feel like compared to others I've tried, [this one] much more lightweight and doesn't leave that greasy residue that's hard to get off

Does exactly what a good foaming Cleanser should do. Give you that really "clean" feeling but doesn't strip your face of moisture and you skin is so soft after using. I have paired it with the honey mask, honey halo cream and honey grail oil and it all works so good together . Truly a god send for dry skin!

review_title: Love the feeling, hate the smell
review_text: I really love this cleanser but the fragrance is soooooo strong i can't get past it :( I will finish the bottle but will not repurchase. I hope they come out with a fragrance free version!
The consistency and texture were great, and it cleansed my face without feeling too stripping. BUT the smell is wayyyyy too strong. I couldn‚Äôt get passed that. Returned.

review_title: Farmacy Clean Bee Ultra-Gentle Facial Cleanser
review_text: I love this product. It smells like raw honey and has a great consistency. It doesn't leave my face feeling too dry. My new fave!

I really like the herbal-ish scent. It‚Äôs not overpowering or anything, just fresh! It lightly bubbles up & removes any makeup on your face (even mascara). Leaves my face feeling nice and smooth after using. Having the pump is also so handy. I would really recommend.

Completely broke me out, I normally do not write reviews but always read them. I do not have sensitive skin, it is typically normal, I use yttp green tea facial cleanser or the truth juice daily cleanser .I wanted to try something new and the smell is great as well as the consistency and packaging.I wanted to like it because the smell and I love the Farmacy cleansing balm but once I switched to the truth juice my skin has not broken out and has looked 10x better. I do like it to shave my legs though until I run out.

Ok, ordinary  facial cleanser .

Doing its job and not causing skin burn outs or dry out .

Overall it‚Äôs a cleanser, nothing fancy or amazing, but safe product .

Worth buying during sale seasons

This has been a serious staple in my skincare routine, I love it so much. I have very sensitive skin, and this gentle cleanser really removes the dirt and makeup out of my pores at the end of the day without being too harsh on my skin. Lather is nice, and a little goes a very long way!
I love it. I use it day and night. I have dry sensitive skin. It smells amazing and my skin feels supple and younger afterwards haha. I love their honey series.

review_title: Best Cleanser For My Problem Skin!!
review_text: I'm picky about anything that goes on my skin at this point, as most products I've tried will burn my face. Trust me, it can get bad. I've had reactions to tons of cleansers meant for sensitive skin, and this was the first cleanser that didn't burn my face on contact. I love this cleanser already, big fan!!

This cleanser is very non drying and suitable for those people who suffer with dry skin after any wash. I am absolutely love this cleanser on how it clean without stripping. Other than Fresh, this one is my favourite cleanser brand so far. The only thing that i can‚Äôt bear is the smell. It does smell like honey but a bit overpowering. Overall i‚Äôm satisfied.

I love how his cleanser smells. I wanted something hydrating for my dry skin but this ended up congesting my skin. I didn't get actual acne but definitely made my skin look bumpy and textured. My partner has clear skin and he experienced the same thing when he used it. I got too lazy to return it and am probably going to have to throw it away.

Where has this been all my life?! Love this cleanser, super gentle. Not drying, which is great during the cold winter months in Wisconsin. My skin feels super clean after use. Light scent of honey which I love. Hasn‚Äôt broken me out so this will be a keeper for sure.

review_title: Farmacy Clean Bee Ultra-Gentle Facial Cleanser
review_text: I've been using this product for a few months now and I'm impressed. I have combo skin with a very oily T-zone and was on the hunt for a gentle morning cleanser that wouldn't irritate or dry my skin out and this is that exact product. Love it!

review_title: Farmacy Clean Bee Ultra-Gentle Facial Cleanser
review_text: Been a huge fan of Farmacy before it was in Sephora, and I can say this is the best cleanser I've owned and used. I have sensitive, combo, FA skin and have had nothing but positive reactions to it

review_title: Farmacy Clean Bee Ultra-Gentle Facial Cleanser
review_text: I have an unhealthy obsession with the honey grail face oil by farmacy so I thought I‚Äôd give this a go for a cleanser. I don‚Äôt wear much face makeup so I thought this would be great for me as it‚Äôs a gentle cleanser and I don‚Äôt need much makeup removing power. BUT wow this is really effective. It takes mascara and eye liner off so easily and quickly with just one pump and minimal lather. I had previously tried the whipped green cleanser by this brand and found I had to double cleanse to get my eye makeup completely gone, but this takes my eyeliner and mascara off muuuuch easier. It‚Äôs very very gentle though and has such a lovely scent, almost green tea with honey (similar to the oil). My skin feels very clean and I think it settles any irritation or acne I have.
Love this face wash. Foams up nicely and has a mild scent. I‚Äôm on my 4th bottle!

review_title: Farmacy Clean Bee Ultra-Gentle Facial Cleanser
review_text: Ultra gentle like the product claims, but does not remove makeup and my face did not feel refreshed or as clean it should be after cleansing. Personally, I would love a little more lather and maybe a gentle exfoliant incorporated!

I tried this based on Tristan‚Äôs suggestion (Metrotown store). I‚Äôve been using it for a few days now and all I can say is ‚ÄúThank you‚Äù This cleanser is so gentle on my skin and my face is soft and clean, no dryness or redness!

review_title: Farmacy Clean Bee Ultra-Gentle Facial Cleanser
review_text: Horrible product, very drying and not at all good for sensitive skin.

By far my favorite face wash! My skin does best with a lightweight, gentle cleanser, and this is exactly that! This cleanser removed dirt, excess oil, and makeup, yet is still extremely gentle. It has a very light, clean scent to it as well. Must-have!

it's super gentle but doesnt leave my face dry after the wash!
repeated purchase!!
BEST clean cleanser for dry skin and sensitive skin ! foams easy you dont need much and its great for antiaging(in my humble opinion) LOVE THIS !

review_title: Farmacy Clean Bee Ultra-Gentle Facial Cleanser
review_text: Was good for a while, I'm on my third bottle of this cleanser and for some reason it's leaving my skin dry and makes my cheeks feel warm after using it. Maybe I'm suddenly sensitive to an ingredient or they've changed the formula, but I'll have to give up what was once my favorite cleanser. I'd say if you already have sensitive skin you may wanna pass on this.

review_title: Farmacy Clean Bee Ultra-Gentle Facial Cleanser
review_text: I love this for my skin! I use it in the morning and night

review_title: Farmacy Clean Bee Ultra-Gentle Facial Cleanser
review_text: A gentle cleanser that smells nice and great for sensitive skin. It‚Äôs the first cleanser I‚Äôve used in years that I like *almost* as much as the Fresh Soy Cleanser. I love the packaging too‚Äî so easy to use the pump bottle in the shower! Only downside is it runs out quite quickly.

Smells like honey, love it. The product doesn‚Äôt strip off the moisture from your face which is a super plus! But it doesn‚Äôt do much besides that. I guess it sticks true to its function of just being a facial wash. Each pump is for a wash which is a great design!

I love Farmacy products but this cleanser for me was a no-go and I will sadly be returning it. I have combination skin and wanted a gentle cleanser to remove makeup that didn't make my face as dry as the Sahara desert aaaaaand this ain't the one. It dried my face out instantly making it feel tight as soon as I washed it off and I didn't even use very much product. I tried using more and same result. I love that it has a pump for convenience and the ingredients seem great but alas, this was a dud for me.

I have rather sensitive, combo-oily skin so I really gravitate towards gentler cleansers. I primarily use this cleanser to wash off the cleansing balm in my double cleanse, and I love that it takes everything off without leaving my skin feeling overly stripped. I typically try to avoid washing my face with cleanser in the mornings (I just use lukewarm water), but this cleanser is gentle enough that I'm comfortable using it in the mornings if I feel a little extra greasy or need to wash off an overnight mask.
Scent is good but this made my skin dry and irritated. Had break-out with this one, tried using for three days but no progress at all. Not a fan of this product.
This is the only soap my husband will use for his eczema on his face. He loves it and it soothes his skin. The smell is great too.

I  am really disappointed in this cleanser. The description and reviews sounded promising and it does do a decent job of removing makeup and daily grime, but for a product with hyaluronic acid and honey which claims to hydrate as it cleanses I have found that my skin has never felt dryer and tighter than after I used this. I gave it a couple weeks to see if my skin was just adjusting to the change in cleanser but have seen no improvements, and have since had to really do some rescue and rehab on my skin to restore the moisture and get rid of the dry, flaky spots cropping up.
Does not dry out my skin and leaves it feeling clean and smooth!
Not my favorite. I bought this on a whim and it dried my face out. It smells great cleans well just not for me.

review_title: Farmacy Clean Bee Ultra-Gentle Facial Cleanser
review_text: Great clean product. I love washing my face after a long day. Doesn‚Äôt strip your face and you don‚Äôt feel dried or tight this is my third purchase

Absolutely loved this product first 4 months or so of using it in a double cleanse routine. Only need one pump, so the bottle could last a really long time, making it much more cost effective in general. Didn't irritate my sensitive skin, even with the light honey fragrance. Well that took a turn about a month ago, and now the fragrance has started to degrade or breakdown, because it is getting insanely intense. Gave myself a two week break, everything was fine. Tried it again, 45 minute sneezing fit. Skin isn't irritated, but eyes are bloodshot and very irritated for hours afterwards. Gave myself another week break, no allergy issues. Took an allergy pill and tried again. EVEN WORSE. Bottle clearly states 12M from opening, but I would give it 3M. There is no way you can use this entire bottle in 3 months unless you try using as a body wash. So if your entire 4 person family uses the same face wash, go for it. Otherwise, hard pass for sensitive skin or people with allergies. Such a disappointment that the shelf life is so off.
I‚Äôve been using this product for around 3 years and it‚Äôs never let me down. It cleans perfectly and I feel refreshed after.

review_title: Farmacy Clean Bee Ultra-Gentle Facial Cleanser

 feeling. Make to follow instructions and add a splash of water after you have already rubbed it on your face.

I‚Äôve been using this for about 5 years and I can not live without it! It‚Äôs the last step in my nightly skincare routine. review_title: Save Your Money; This doesn't Work
review_text:

Save your money

great cleansing oil! It takes off my makeup well and is also great for oil bc leading in general if that‚Äôs what you‚Äôre into. However, the packaging is TERRIBLE!!! The pump gets stuck and I have to unscrew the cap and pour the oil into my hand. Besides that, it gets the job done.

Really enjoy this cleansing oil. Great first step in my cleansing routine to help remove all my makeup, and most importantly does not irritate my eyes. Also don't mind the fragrance as it's a rinse-off product.

review_title: cooling effect makes my eyes burn

Was looking for an alternative to my favourite cleansing oil, which is Dermalogica Pre-cleanse. This one isn't exactly cheap, but much more affordable in comparison. It was effective in taking off sunscreen and makeup, and it's good that it's unscented, but one star off because the name of the product made me think it has some kind of cooling effect and it doesn't. (Makes sense, since people would probably be using it close to their eyes, but still!)
This product does a great job of getting the makeup off. It doesn‚Äôt always spread easily in the beginning but it doesn‚Äôt leave any makeup behind
Love this stuff!!! Great for dry skin. Removes make-up easily and leaves your face nice and soft.

review_title: tarte Sea Deep Dive Makeup Removing Gel Cleanser  - 150ml
review_text:
I don‚Äôt have a lot of ‚Äúholy grail‚Äù products, but this cleanser has had me on edge since I tried the sample and knew: This is perfect for my skin. The name at that time was Rainforest of the Sea Deep Dive Cleansing Gel, and I knew it was too crazy to stay the same. I just hoped it could be rebranded but not reformulated.

Do we have the same skin? Maybe, maybe not. I‚Äôm intensely fair, oily nose, dry forehead with texture, beginning to age (I‚Äôm 38). I find it adequately removes KVD tattoo eyeliner and remnants of eye lash glue, and plumps my skin.

The residue? Not quite a residue for me. It‚Äôs more like a Dove nutrium effect - there is an emollient that replaces the natural oils it washed away. Like a 2 for one. If I skip moisturizer, I don‚Äôt have a painfully tight and flaking face. I would say, if you use Dove body washes and understand what I mean, you will probably like this feeling too. My skin looks smoother, younger, plump.

For me, it replaced Philosophy‚Äôs Purity. Bested it. I almost never have breakouts with this formula, and I attribute that to the way the cleaner keeps the moisture balance.

review_text:

My one complaint is the packaging‚Äîit feels like this bottle will absolutely never biodegrade and, ironically, will end up floating in the ocean. Though it lasts me a long time with each purchase, I feel guilty buying this knowing how little product is in the package. Also I used to really like the gold/purple branding because it was unique. I realize the new light green tone on tone design is much more on trend, but it looks generic to me now. Obviously not enough for me to rate the product down, just annoying to see Tarte jumping on this basic b style bandwagon.

unique_id: TARTE-Sea Deep Dive Makeup Removing Gel Cleanser
review_text: I usually LOVE everything Tarte comes out with (especially their skincare, it is a total surprise that they have amazing skincare!) except this one is a letdown for me. I keep using it in hopes it‚Äôll be different one day but nope haha. I saw it claims to have marine algae to help with fine lines and vitamin c for brightening but I don‚Äôt see any difference (I know those results might take a while to see with daily use but most cleansers make my face brighter instantly and in an obvious way but not with this one). This cleanser does foam up well though for being a gel/thin liquid consistency. If you‚Äôre looking for something hydrating their h20 moisturizer and marine boosting spray is the way to go instead of this (those I‚Äôve tried and are great! I‚Äôve used them on people who have dry skin as well and they work wonders).

Dermalogica is one of the best skincare lines out there which is why so many spas use the line for facials. I have friends who are estheticians who use it on their own faces. If they use it, well I take it as a sign I should, too.

This is a great product! 
Dermalogica fan for life!

This cleansing oil is gentle yet effective, emulsifying nicely to remove my makeup and sunscreen - you gotta use sunscreen no matter what! Just one pump does the trick, a little goes a long ways. I will definitely be keeping this on my counter as a must have.

I hate all the makeup removers I've tried in the past. This was recommended to me in store by an associate, and I do not regret this purchase at all. It's so easy to use and it washes everything away without needing to scrub or wipe hard. I use it before a shower and follow up with a cleanser or face scrub. It's perfect!

This is hands down the best precleanse I‚Äôve ever used. I‚Äôve tried quite a few like Clinique, Drunk Elephant, Sephora, and YTTP but nothing beats this one. review_title: Best oil cleanser for people with clogged pores
review_text: Before trying this, I thought I was set on simply using the DHC Cleansing Oil for the rest of my life, but one day I ran out, I couldn't wait for it to be shipped to my house so I picked this up instead. I thought I was just using it until I got my DHC, but now I can't imagine life without it. This is the most thoroughly cleansing oil cleanser on the market and you don't need to wait five minutes like with other cleansers for gunk to start coming out of your pores. A little rubbing and I can see blackheads and sebum galore coming out on my hands. With other cleansers, I would be rubbing for like ten minutes before I could feel the sebum loosening. I have oily dehydrated skin with heavy pores, but you wouldn't know it now. This has kept my skin at the cleanest it's ever been. I'm a girl who has to shave her neck unfortunately so I tend to get a lot of ingrown hairs and blackheads, but since I've started using this, I haven't had too many problems. I feel like the serums and treatments that I've been using to clear up the dark spots I have on my neck are actually getting through because there's no gunk waiting to stop them. Using this in combination with their special cleansing gel, I wipe my cotton pad with my toner and see no leftover residue. It runs out quicker than I would like, but there's no other product that cleans my skin as this does, so on my vanity it shall stay.

I was gifted by dermalogica in exchange for my honest reveiw. I love that this doesn‚Äôt leave a sticky film on my face after washing off. It cleans off makeup so easily and doesn‚Äôt sting or burn the eyes. It is great for washing off sunscreen too. It doesn‚Äôt feel too stripping or drying as well!

I have a very sensitive pale skin that gets easily irritated in colder seasons. Sometimes even peeling, especially the eyelids. This cleansing oil has been amazing! I‚Äôd does it‚Äôs job and doesn‚Äôt dry my skin at all. I definitely recommend it!

I loooove this pre cleanse oil. It does such a good job at taking off makeup and sunscreen effortlessly without causing irritation. Definitely recommend for anyone looking for a makeup remover! You won‚Äôt regret it. Gifted by dermalogica

This product was complimentary from Dermalogica. This pre cleansing oil gently removes my makeup and it‚Äôs non irritating for my skin. I usually use balm cleansing but I‚Äôm going to change it to this cleansing oil and see how it is for my skin long term!

It removes some makeup, but does not do a thorough job. I also do not like the smell (almost plastic-y or like homemade play dough). Would not repurchase for the price.
Love this product. Not at all oily or drying sometimes I just use this without washing my face after and I don‚Äôt breakout at all.

This does not do a good job at removing makeup. And I don‚Äôt wear waterproof or tenacious makeup either. I need to use so much of this at a time just to get some makeup off. Not worth it. Will not repurchase once I finish it.

review_title: Drunk Elephant E-Rase‚Ñ¢ Milki Micellar Water

review_title: Drunk Elephant E-Rase‚Ñ¢ Milki Micellar Water
review_text: Great to remove light make-up. I will buy again. Light texture and no residue.

review_title: Drunk Elephant E-Rase‚Ñ¢ Milki Micellar Water
review_text: Nothing special about this product. Waste of money.
literally the worst product i have ever purchased. feels like nothing on the skin and doesn't even take your makeup off.

review_title: Gentle and effective. Non eye irritating
review_text:
I got this once I started going to the gym more and just quickly wanted to do a quick ‚Äòface wash‚Äô in the gym after my workout. It got the job done for me to be able to finish errands throughout the day without feeling grimey. I‚Äôm more oily, so the fact that this is milky just let‚Äôs me put on sunscreen and I‚Äôm hydrated enough. There‚Äôs no scent to this. The texture is like runny, creamy milk- I know, odd that yeah. You don‚Äôt need lots depending on what you‚Äôre removing. I only use sunscreen and I‚Äôm getting rid of the sweat so that‚Äôs as far as I am using this product. Sometimes my friends and I get drunk and we paint our eyelids Euphoria style and this has always gotten off the make up! 
I would use a cotton pad and drop like 2-5 (depending on desired saturation) and just rub the pad so the product gets absorbed by the pad and just gently rub around. I clean around my eyes, it hasn‚Äôt gotten me irritated yet. Leaves me feeling very refreshed and ready for sunscreen or facial spray. Depends how spicy I‚Äôm feeling

This is my first introduction to micellar water. I only wear make up for special events so this is not a regular use product for me. I actually bought it for those occasional lazy days when I get home super late and don't feel like washing my face. If I don't do something to sorta get the oils off of my face before bed, I am guaranteed to wake up with acne. This stuff is definitely creamy and moisturizing. Which is great. But at the same time, I wonder how good it is at actually getting the oil off my skin because it doesn't feel any cleaner. It hasn't left me with acne in the morning so I guess that's a positive. But again this my first try with micellar water so I have nothing to compare it to. I like it ok, but not sure if I will repurchase for the price.

I love this micellar water! It‚Äôs so gentle and silky on the skin and it doesn‚Äôt irritate my skin at all. It‚Äôs really good at getting off makeup and spf, however even after using this to double cleanse (this as my first cleanse and Krave Beauty‚Äôs Matcha Hemp Hydrating Cleanser as my second cleanse), I still have stubborn waterproof mascara left over. Other than that, I really like it.

Amazing makeup remover!!! I was using Lanc√¥me Bi-Facil but it‚Äôs too oily. My contacts were suffering. E-Race removed my mascara (UD Wild Lash) & eyeliner (Lanc√¥me 24H Drama Liqui Pencil in Matte), no tugging or rubbing. I just kept wiping (3x) my eyes to be a 100% clean. The smell is amazing & it feels so nice on your eyes. It didn‚Äôt sting my eyes or make my contacts cloudy. It also didn‚Äôt leave my eye lids or under my eyes dry. Lanc√¥me Bi-Facil always left my eye area dry after use. Definitely worth purchasing!!! This is my new go to make up remover. Thank you Drunk Elephant! My first purchase from this brand & I‚Äôll will be going back for more!

review_title: Drunk Elephant E-Rase‚Ñ¢ Milki Micellar Water
review_text: The best micellar water. Removes even the most stubborn mascara, I‚Äôve repurchased a couple of times. It‚Äôs a must have and doesn‚Äôt irritate my eyes at all!
For my oily skin, it might be leave sticky feeling esp if i dont wash my face after, but i dont mind.. it has a nice cooling effect and remove all the impurities well

review_title: Drunk Elephant E-Rase‚Ñ¢ Milki Micellar Water
review_text: Nothing special I would rather just get a micellar water from the drug store, it works better than this.

review_title: Drunk Elephant E-Rase‚Ñ¢ Milki Micellar Water
review_text: A happy customer! My skin really like this formula, it‚Äôs effective at getting off light makeup while staying hydrating. Second purchase of the Mini size, definitely worth a try!

This micellar water is very gentle on the skin and therefore good for frequent use. Although it is not strong enough to effectively remove full makeup, it is useful when I just want to refresh my face anytime of the day. Will repurchase.

review_text: I usually use the original micellar water from the drugstore but decided to switch over to this one because I love Drunk Elephant. This consistency is a little thicker than most micellar water brands but still does the job. I like it but it's nothing too special. I do like how it's ingredients are a lot better but it is pricy.

review_title: Drunk Elephant E-Rase‚Ñ¢ Milki Micellar Water
review_text: Seriously the best Micellar water I‚Äôve found! Cleans and leaves my skin feeling so soft and refreshed. Only downside might be the smell!

Great to use on sensitive eyes as it doesn't irritate or sting the eyes at all.  Removes makeup and cleanses the face well.  I still like to rinse after using it even though the bottle says you don't need to.  I didn't like how it smelled, but its still a good quality product overall.
Okay product. Nothing special about this. Didn‚Äôt like it

review_title: Drunk Elephant E-Rase‚Ñ¢ Milki Micellar Water
review_text: This stuff is amazing! I‚Äôm usually pretty good about my skin routine and washing makeup off from my face. I use this to get all of my makeup off including the stubborn stain lipstick and waterproof mascara. My skin feels clean afterwards and not dry.
i thought it was ok i don‚Äôt really know how to use it though.

review_title: Best Micellar water I‚Äôve used yet.
review_text: Honestly I‚Äôm surprised this product doesn‚Äôt have a higher rating. It‚Äôs fantastic! I‚Äôm an avid micellar water user. I‚Äôm too lazy to do a whole routine at night after a long day at work and have to wash my face, so this is a great alternative. It takes makeup off without you having to scrub and rub at all, it‚Äôs non greasy and leaves your skin feeling smooth and clean afterwards. It‚Äôs great on sensitive skin also, which is a huge plus for me. No irritation or break outs at all. I‚Äôll continue to buy this product every time, it‚Äôs by far the best micellar I‚Äôve used to date.

this is much to expensive to use as a micellar water BUT as a toner i find the price more justifiable. since it is packed with barrier supporting ingredients such as ceramides, vit e, & fatty acids i like to put a few drops on my hand and pat it into my skin when i‚Äôm feeling dry & tight. it leaves my skin feeling cool & refreshed. with a watery, milky texture, it is very easy to dab onto skin & i almost wish it came as a spray.

I really like this product as an all around cleanser. It's more creamy that traditional micellar water, which I think helps with makeup removal, and I end up using less as it isn't splashing out of the bottle. I do have to take a little more time with my mascara, but if you let it sit for a few seconds, it removes it well. My skin always feels soft after using, but it does feel like there is a little residue that it leaves behind. I usually use a mild toner after to help with that. Overall, great product, I ended up buying two.

review_title: Drunk Elephant E-Rase‚Ñ¢ Milki Micellar Water
review_text: Love this product! I got this to take off my makeup around the areas I usually struggle to get with my cleanser (my hairline and jaw line), as well as replacing my old eye makeup remover. This works really well and removes my makeup amazingly!
I‚Äôve never found a micellar water with milky texture and nourishing effect afterwards. Cleanse my skin quite well and leaves no films. Smells a little rancid after 6 months

review_title: convenient for people always on the go
review_text: As someone who is always on the go, it can be hard to have a full cleansing session. This product is a game Changer for me. It leaves my skin feeling so soft and clean. It does smell like play doh, and I wouldn‚Äôt recommend applying with a cotton ball because the cotton ball will soak up a lot of the product so you end up using a lot more than you need to but I use my little face scrubber to apply it and wipe away with the cotton ball.
Doesn't take off anything except the most easily wiped away powder foundation. Eye makeup? Mascara? Forget it.

This product is hydrating and soft on the skin which is the reason for the two star but would not re-purchase this. I feel like I need a lot of product to get my very minimal makeup daily off. It says to hold product on tougher makeup and not scrub but I feel like I need to scrub in order to get my eye brown pencil to come off. To me this product is not worth the money at all.

This product is great. Don‚Äôt look at is just a way to remove makeup. It does a pretty good job removing makeup, but a gentle face wash after is necessary if you‚Äôre removing heavy makeup - which you should be doing after heavy makeup use anyways. I love using this every day in the morning to clean my sensitive skin followed by moisturizer, instead of face wash. It‚Äôs very hydrating and does a great job cleaning pores. I also find my moisturizer works even better when I use this as a base. I use kiehls ultra facial cream and Ren gentle cleansing milk face wash. I have sensitive, dry, acne prone skin and this combo is doing wonders for me. I only do face wash if I‚Äôve used makeup or if not every other day (trial and error has shown me washing my face when I haven‚Äôt used makeup is too harsh and irritates my skin. This product is amazing as a gentle substitute)

review_title: Drunk Elephant E-Rase‚Ñ¢ Milki Micellar Water
review_text: I‚Äôm glad I bought the mini because I‚Äôm having a hard time finishing it. It‚Äôs not awful but also nothing to write home about. It doesn‚Äôt dry out my skin especially around my eyes but it also does not do a great job at removing mascara.

review_title: Drugstore micellars are way better AND cheaper‚Ä¶
review_text:
DE‚Äôs micellar water has a watery lotion type consistency, a lot of the product absorbs into your cotton pad (if you‚Äôre using one) so you have to use extra product to get the job done, and there‚Äôs a distinct play dough smell to the solution‚Äîbut it is fragrance free I believe.

This is one of the oiliest micellar waters I‚Äôve ever used and it always left a light a noticeable oil film on my face after use. While I typically double cleanse with some kind of water based cleanser after my micellar water step, with my Bioderma micellar I could sometimes be lazy and skip that step while not sacrificing clean skin. With DE‚Äôs micellar I felt like if I didn‚Äôt use a cleanser after use my skin was still dirty and would likely be too oily for my essence and serums to properly absorb.

Overall I gave this two stars. One star because I have very sensitive skin and over the course of using this for two months I didn‚Äôt notice any irritation. The other star I gave is because while I did not like this one bit, it might be somebody‚Äôs HG? Somebody with incredibly dry skin, is not acne prone in the slightest, and doesn‚Äôt use any serums or watery products after cleansing‚Ä¶ just goes straight to a cream.

I subtracted a star because while there weren‚Äôt any large breakouts I would trace back to this, I felt like I got a few more little whiteheads here and there than usual. Another star was subtracted because I feel it didn‚Äôt do the job and required that you go in with a second cleanse (not optional like most micellars). And the final star was subtracted because drugstore micellars are doing a far superior job than this for just a fraction of the price. Save your money!

review_title: Drunk Elephant E-Rase‚Ñ¢ Milki Micellar Water
review_text: The first time I bought this I loved it, it took off all my makeup and my face felt very refreshed after use. The second time I bought it, it still did everything it had done before but now there‚Äôs a strong scent of play-dough that I really hate.
Love this! It makes my skin feels clean after using it. Very effective when it comes to removing make-up. Will purchase again, worth it for the price

review_title: Drunk Elephant E-Rase‚Ñ¢ Milki Micellar Water
review_text: Not a big fan, this was sold to me as an alternative for face cleaning wipes and it just doesn‚Äôt compare. This is more like something you might use after you washed your face.

I wasn't sure about this product when I ordered it but I actually really enjoy using it. It says you can use it to remove makeup but my preferred way to use it is in the morning as a gentle cleanser. It is really milky and my skin feels soft afterwards.
Removes eyeliner and mascara very quickly. I wish I would‚Äôve tried micelles water sooner because it‚Äôs so much easier than a balm where I feel a film is left behind or my skin and around my eyes.

review_title: Drunk Elephant E-Rase‚Ñ¢ Milki Micellar Water
review_text: This stuff is great! It‚Äôs gentle & does wonders removing makeup.

review_title: Drunk Elephant E-Rase‚Ñ¢ Milki Micellar Water
review_text: One of my favorite drunk elephant products! It's gentle and effective, works for my sensitive skin!

review_title: Drunk Elephant E-Rase‚Ñ¢ Milki Micellar Water
review_text: To give this product the review it deserves, I have to confess a secret: prior to using this I had not been using any form of regular facial cleanser for probably a decade because my skin was doing its own thing pretty well and I didn't want to mess with it (just water and occasionally coconut oil for makeup removal). Coming into my 30s I wanted to expand my skincare routine, but I was nervous about messing up my skin's moisture barrier, so I wanted something really gentle and this is PERFECT. It works well enough to remove makeup but doesn't feel drying or abrasive in any way and my face feels so dewy and fresh after using it. I originally ordered the small size to test it out and I'm already back to order the larger size after only a couple of weeks.

This is an amazing product I use it every day on my dry skin to remove skincare from the night before. It has changed my like and is the ONLY morning cleanse that doesn‚Äôt irritate my face! I absolutely love this product.

I got this as a sample before I bought a full size. I had never heard of this before and was surprised at how well it worked to help remove makeup.

There‚Äôs nothing bad about it. This part is simply a personal preference: it‚Äôs something you wipe off, not wash off and to me that just feels weird, like I‚Äôm leaving something on my skin. I don‚Äôt FEEL anything. It‚Äôs just a mental thing.

review_title: use this for added hydration before my serums
review_text: I enjoy this product!  Bottle has lasted me forever. I‚Äôve been using this product as a hydrating essence instead of a cleanser. After I wash my face this adds the extra moisture I need prior to adding my serums & moisturizer morning & night. The ingredients are excellent and my skin responds well. Highly recommend this multi use product

Love this micellar water, i think it is worth the money as its soft, light, milky and really does a good job at removing facial dirt and debris. I havent yet tried removing makeup but have high hopes. The only two cons to this product are the smell although its not that strong and easy to get used to. The other con is that there wasnt a seal beyond the lid and so i couldnt really tell if the product had ever been used or not. I doubt it but personally, i love that reassurance.

review_title: Gives your skin a boost of hydration
review_text: Makes your skin feel hydrated and refreshed.  I use it in the morning to give my skin a little extra moisture before putting on my Tatcha water cream.  I use it at night to take off any makeup that  wasn‚Äôt removed when I washed my face.

review_title: A Worthy Upgrade To My Old Micellar Water!!!
review_text: I upgraded from my drugstore micelles water. I am not a big face washer at night (I am usually so tired I can‚Äôt bear washing my face with water and getting wet). I have been using the miceller water to get rid of my eye makeup. I have not been using it on my face because of the greasy feel. This one is so healthy and moisturizing, I use it all over. I don‚Äôt use a lot and it takes off my Pat McGrath eyeshadow and Bobbi Brown Mascara (I don‚Äôt use waterproof so I can‚Äôt say if that come off as easy). The rest of my face comes off easy too. I love that is fast and I wake up in the morning to healthy skin, not greasy skin. It is worth the price and a real upgrade!

Im loving microwater for how easy it is to quickly clean your face without having to wash it, its incredibly convenient for on the go and great for if you've been out too late and you are tired. Plus its moisturizing instead of drying! One swipe with a cotton pad removes all the dirt, oil and residual makeup from your face, even when you think your face was clean. The only downside is this particular serum doesn't seem to do anything for my skin other than clean it, a previous microwater I had tried noticeably improved my skin and closed my pores. Overall though I highly recommend adding micellar water to your skincare collection

review_title: Love it but it‚Äôs not for heavy duty removal
review_text: Great for a morning cleanse/refresh, and also a great way to break down any remnants of mascara left behind be your cleansing balm or oils. To effectively remove all of your make with this before a double cleanse, you have to use quite a bit. I can‚Äôt imagine this product being a good fit for everyone, but it‚Äôs creamy and gentle and I was surprised that I like it as much as I do. I don‚Äôt think this would be the best choice for people who do a full beat every single day. It‚Äôs just perfect for my sensitive skin and medium coverage everyday makeup.
Very gentle on my skin. Leaves my skin feeling completely clean. I don't wear foundation so it doesn't take much on a piece of cotton to cover my face and neck. Definitely purchasing again.

review_title: if i could turn back time...
review_text: I wish I could tell past self not to buy this last year. For half the price (CDN), you can purchase a bottle of Bioderma, which is way more effective at removing makeup in my opinion. Unfortunately, all this did was move my makeup around, or fade it out..the only thing good I can say about it is its certainly gentle on the skin. That's it. Please just save your money, its not worth it!

I use this product every day after I do a workout, and it's great for getting all the sweat and grime off ‚Äì it leaves me feeling refreshed and clean! I don't think this would be great for getting off a full face of makeup (although I haven't tried), but it's definitely a great choice as a light and gentle cleanser when you aren't wearing any makeup.

I especially love that this product has never left my skin feeling stripped ‚Äì most cleansers leave my skin feeling tight/dry right after, but this one never does!

Good amount for the price, like how it works and feels. Would love to have it in different packaging, for whatever reason the bottle doesnt sit well, maybe I‚Äôm crazy.

Does what it‚Äôs supposed to do and doesnt strip my dry, dry skin!
I have yet to finish it ... i bought this in hopes to stop using makeup remover wipes and I still end up reaching for the wipes. Save your money, theres other stuff out there

review_title: Drunk Elephant E-Rase‚Ñ¢ Milki Micellar Water
review_text: Ok for what it is. I have used this for about 2 months now and while it does make my skin softer, it does not do a good job of removing sunscreen on my face. I noticed that when I apply toner after my second cleanse, there is still sunscreen being taken off my face (my sunscreen is slightly tinted so I am able to tell). Not worth the money.

The first time I used this product I hated it. It irritated my eyes and it just wasn't as effective as the makeup removing balm from Drunk Elephant. Now I use it as a morning cleanser and any time I need to do a quick clean in a pinch without using water! By using it in the morning it has made a huge difference in my skin. I have less dryness and redness and overall my skin feels really nice and prepped for the day. Personally, I think that if you want a product that removes makeup, use the makeup removing balm from Drunk Elephant instead. I would highly suggest this for morning or quick day time cleansing, like after working out!
I have very sensitive skin that reacts to everything, but it loves this. It gives your skin a good cleanse and makes it soft and glowing.

The product itself is very gentle and hydrating on the skin, but it doesn't deliver quite as well on results. It doesn't easily remove mascara and you have to use quite a bit, making it not particularly worth the money. I'll continue to use the rest of the bottle, but I won't buy it again.
My favorite makeup remover EVER. It always leaves my skin feeling so soft after and it‚Äôs the easiest thing I‚Äôve found to remove heavy eye makeup !!

Ive tried a loooot of micellar waters and this is by far my favorite! I use this after exercising during the day so I don‚Äôt have to wash my face and irritate it more. I don‚Äôt recommand to use it to wash your face at night, but it‚Äôs great for a quick refresh.

review_title: Drunk Elephant E-Rase‚Ñ¢ Milki Micellar Water
review_text: I love this Micellar Water, I gave it 4 stars because it definitely does not take off waterproof products like mascara/eyeliner so I wouldn‚Äôt use it as a makeup remover HOWEVER I‚Äôll use this all over my face before bed sometimes instead of cleanser (if it‚Äôs one of those days) and it does take the oil/dirt away, doesn‚Äôt make my face feel oily or really dry AND doesn‚Äôt break me out which was a winner for me because my skin is really sensitive

review_title: Drunk Elephant E-Rase‚Ñ¢ Milki Micellar Water
review_text: This made me break out, and I don‚Äôt have sensitive skin. This also felt so weird, almost like it was literally doing nothing. I‚Äôd also try to put it on a cotton to wipe my face with and it‚Äôd soak in too quickly. I was having to use too much.

review_title: Drunk Elephant E-Rase‚Ñ¢ Milki Micellar Water
review_text: I love to use this after a workout or in the morning. It‚Äôs not the best to remove heavy make up but works great for a gentle non irritating cleanse.
This is the first micellar water I have tried but it works well for me. I use it to touch up smudges and take my make up off, mostly eye make up. It doesn‚Äôt leave a noticeable film. Not scented.

review_title: Drunk Elephant E-Rase‚Ñ¢ Milki Micellar Water
review_text: I love this product! I initially received a mini size as part of another DE set, and it has now become one of my favorite Drunk Elephant products. I don‚Äôt wear a lot of makeup, so this works perfectly to refresh my face and remove my mascara at the end of the day. It makes my skin feel clean, smooth, and hydrated.

I don‚Äôt get what all the hype is about. I only like this as a refresher after waking up because beyond that - it‚Äôs not good. It doesn‚Äôt remove makeup completely - it might help with bits of mascara under your eyes after double cleansing - which sounds silly. 
You have to use so much product to use it as an actual remover - 
I will not purchase this again.

review_title: This is not a micellar water
review_text: This has a texture of watery lotion or milk, it is not good for removing make up. This is not a micellar milk in a sense the other brands are calling it. A lot of the product is needed to make it work and avoid panda eyes, really need to scrub and rub (against the instructions on the package) to see any result, even after soaking my eyes and lashes in this product. Misleading advertising, questionable purpose, will not repurchase. I‚Äôm usually a fan of DE products, wanted to find my mew favorite eye make up remover, but this "water" is not it.

I don't use this for makeup removal & don't recommend using this as your only cleanse if you are using this to remove makeup.. otherwise use the Slai makeup melting cleansing balm instead, it works better & I recommend doing a double cleanse (makeup removal & second cleanse). This is my absolute favorite for a first thing in the morning cleanse, it does the job to remove any leftover skincare from the night before & adds hydration & preps my skin for my morning skin care routine. I also like this as a mid day refresher or almost as a toner before my night time skin care. I find this way more nourishing than the standard micellar water & has better for your skin ingredients. I have sensitive acne prone skin & this has never caused an issue.

review_title: Drunk Elephant E-Rase‚Ñ¢ Milki Micellar Water
review_text: Cleansing in AM & PM can be drying and stripping for my face, and this product helps me be able to keep my face clean by using it in the morning instead of cleansing. It‚Äôs really hydrating too! I do use it some at night before cleansing on light makeup days. But it‚Äôs mostly for the morning to clean my face before the rest of my routine. I was getting the mini size for awhile and it would last me 1.5 month  at least if I was using it primarily in the am! I didn‚Äôt experience any negative side effects or reactions.

I used to use the Beauty Water from Son and Park, but switched to this as Sephora no longer carries that product. This micellar really is "milki". But it is gentle and I enjoy it in the morning for a quick facial refresh and after a workout. Its gentle but I don't love it for mascara/eye make up removal. No eye burning but just not super effective. Will stick with Tatcha one step cleansing oil for eye makeup removal.

review_title: Drunk Elephant E-Rase‚Ñ¢ Milki Micellar Water
review_text: I‚Äôm addicted to this stuff! I accidentally ordered two and I‚Äôm glad I did because I use it throughout the day and I‚Äôm sure I will in the summer too. It leaves my skin feeling fresh and clean! I‚Äôm a face toucher when stressed and I have 7 kids... including twin toddlers and teenagers, so I‚Äôm stressed just a little bit. I take a couple of mins to sneak away and wipe this on my face for a quick pick me up and it‚Äôs helped to keep down on extra oil from so much touching.

I love Drunk Elephant products so this review is hard.  This micellar water does not work as described.  It does not remove make-up or cleanse.  Not sure what happened here. All the other DE cleansers are great.  Skip this product and choose another of DE cleanser.

review_title: Drunk Elephant E-Rase‚Ñ¢ Milki Micellar Water
review_text: This is my second favorite drunk elephant product (after the c-tango eye cream). While it‚Äôs not a desert island product and I COULD live without it, I don‚Äôt ever want to. The consistency is like a thick, milky water, and I wouldn‚Äôt use it as a stand-alone makeup remover, but it‚Äôs a great second step after cleansing to ~erase~ any leftover makeup and really feel like I‚Äôm cleaning the day off my skin. I also use this on work-from-home days when I need a quick refresh in between meetings. My skin always feels soft and lightly moisturized after I use this, and I particularly love that it‚Äôs clean and gentle enough to swipe across my eyes and lips. Weirdly enough, I feel like the product is almost most beneficial/refreshing on dry lips, and I like to think that it makes my eyelashes look a little healthier too.

I have dry skin so I don't like to wash my face in the morning, but I do like to feel like I have a blank canvas. I didn't want to use a typical micellar water because I was worried it would be too stripping or would need to be rinsed off so I bought this. It works perfectly for what I bought it for! I have not tried to remove makeup with it, but it does remove any leftover evening products (I slug with Aquaphor at night so I usually have some leftover in the morning) without leaving my skin feeling stripped. I do not rinse it off so I can say it does not break me out, or interfere with any products used on top of it in my morning routine or makeup.

I love love love this product. It leaves your skin so supple and smooth. I just wish you didn‚Äôt have to use so much of it. I wear mascara, under eye concealer, and a little bronzer daily and I feel like I shouldn‚Äôt have to use so much of this product when I don‚Äôt use that much makeup.

review_title: Drunk Elephant E-Rase‚Ñ¢ Milki Micellar Water
review_text: I received a-ease as a sample as a part of one of the DE kits and have been using it in the mornings instead of washing my face. It feels super nice, leaves my skin clean and hydrated and ready for my next steps of my skincare routine. Will be purchasing full size once the sample is finished

This is by far the best makeup remover I have ever used! Although it‚Äôs a tad pricy the size is huge so
 I think it‚Äôs worth it. review_text: Amazing cleanser for my oily, sensitive and acne prone skin! I am in  my 40‚Äôs and have tried everything and I mean everything in skin care to try and tame and crazy sensitive, oily and breakout skin. unique_id: JACK BLACK-Deep Dive‚Ñ¢ Glycolic Facial Cleanser
review_text: I run and wear waterproof sunscreen every single day so I need a cleanser that works well. I have combination skin that leans towards oily in the t-zone and dry everywhere else. As a mask I think this did a great job cleansing my pores and soaking up oil. I have a few clogged pores that are very stubborn and didn‚Äôt clear them out but the rest of them looked pretty good. I actually bought this for my husband for me to ‚Äúborrow‚Äù this on occasion he really likes it and his skin looks clearer. I wasn‚Äôt blown away by the results but thought they were good. I was impressed that this didn‚Äôt leave my skin feeling dry. If it had helped unclog my pores/ help remove blackheads better it would have been a five star product.

unique_id: JACK BLACK-Deep Dive‚Ñ¢ Glycolic Facial Cleanser
review_text: As a cleanser this is EXTREMELY harsh. Would never recommend this for daily use - even with a good moisturizer this will destroy your moisture barrier and you will be more acne prone/prone to pigmentation. However, as a mask every once in a while it is phenomenal. I notice a glow immediately after use. If this was marketed differently I would give it 5 stars, but to market as a cleanser is irresponsible.

unique_id: JACK BLACK-Deep Dive‚Ñ¢ Glycolic Facial Cleanser
review_title: The Fountain of Youth Minus Blackheads
review_text: I've struggled with large pores on my nose for about 20 years and my skin texture started getting rough when I turned 30. After using this face wash/mask for a few months, my skin is way less dry, the texture is smooth ALMOST like when I was in my early 20s, I get less breakouts, and my pores look noticeably different. I use this as a mask between 1 and 2 times a week, then I wet my face and lather before washing it off. All other days, I wash my face with water and occasionally use organic lotion if the weather is very dry, but I predict that I'll stop needing lotion altogether soon. This stuff turns back time if you use it consistently, which isn't hard because who doesn't love a spa moment with a mask that has been made using ingredients from the fountain of youth??

unique_id: JACK BLACK-Deep Dive‚Ñ¢ Glycolic Facial Cleanser
review_text: Jack Black continues to impress. I love their peel pads and now this treatment. I‚Äôd never use it as a daily cleanser ‚Äî waaay too harsh and drying; you don‚Äôt want to use clay-based cleansers anyway, because they parch your skin. But as a clay mask ‚Äî yes to the yes! Pulls out all the crap from my pores and leaves skin feeling healthy and glory for a few days after.

review_text:
Your skin has to be indestructible for this to work as a daily face wash. It will dry you out immensely if you use it daily and you will need a good serum and moisturizer to rebalance your face. Works well as a mask but I would not recommend this as a face wash.
I even had my fianc√© try to see if it is just my skin, since we have opposite skin types but same result.

unique_id: JACK BLACK-Deep Dive‚Ñ¢ Glycolic Facial Cleanser
review_text: Wow. Just wow. Such a Deep Clean! I have combination skin with an extremely oily T-zone. This cleanser not only cleans your pores deeply and leaves them feeling fresh and clear for 12+ hours, my t-zone has been so much easier to control in terms of oiliness. I have no issues following with my normal skin care routine (toner, serum, eye gel, moisturizer). My skin feels clean, soft, and supple all day long. I use a more moisturizing cleanser at night just because this cleanser tends to REALLY dry up oils. But other than that, my skin has never been clearer. I haven‚Äôt used this as a mask because I prefer Glam Glow masks, but this makes a perfect once-a-day cleanser!

review_title: YES TO THE YES TO THIS!
review_text: I've used this product both as a mask as an exfoliant; Because it's glycolic acid it was very tingly and I would keep it as a mask for 10 mins and wash it, or other days I would just use it as an exfoliant. Guys ... My skin was sooo bad, so uneven but this mask did wonders. After about 2 weeks my face was satin smooth after I paired this product with The ordinary Glycolic toner and the Ordinary Lactic acid 10% I had no pores! My dark spots disappeared and my skin was even and brighter!!! I definitely recommend! It's a life saver and give great results!

unique_id: JACK BLACK-Deep Dive‚Ñ¢ Glycolic Facial Cleanser
review_text: I rarely write reviews. I bought my boyfriend the skin care travel kit with this in it, and I ended up trying everything of course. This is *the* best chemical cleanser I‚Äôve ever used. I let it sit for a few minutes in the shower and when I got out my skin looked fresh, right, dewy and less red. I have extremely sensitive skin from using tretinoin and suffer from eczema in general. This does not sting or irritate which is shocking because it‚Äôs truly effective. Works a million times better than Peter Thomas Roth or other glycolic cleansers. Don‚Äôt sleep on this one! I hope they never discontinue it.

unique_id: JACK BLACK-Deep Dive‚Ñ¢ Glycolic Facial Cleanser
review_text: I purchased this during the Spring VIB event based on online reviews.  My skin is combination and I live in a humid climate, which contributes to my oils coming out daily.  I used this as a mask and my skin was smoother.  My oils are also significantly decreased in my T-Zone.  I'm very pleased with the results as a mask and the great price point, especially compared to other brand that make you pay for the name, but don't perform as well or at all.  There's also a fantastic amount of product for the price you pay.  Definite win!   I'm definitely putting this on my favorites list on the Sephora app and repurchasing when this tube is done.

unique_id: JACK BLACK-Deep Dive‚Ñ¢ Glycolic Facial Cleanser
review_text:
I've used this both as a mask and a cleanser. It's the first time I've used a chemical exfoliant, and the first time I've chosen a cleanser based on ingredients. It's an amazing cleanser, but you do need to be careful how you apply it!

On the bottle is tells you to lather first, then put it on your face. Do not ignore this! 

I was lathering it on my face and it caused irritation (no, really? rubbing both volcanic ash and glycolic acid all over your cheeks makes them angry? Shock! Amaze! Who could have seen this coming?). The irritation went away after about 3 days and once I started putting it on a face cloth and being gentle with it the irritation disappeared. The reaction was 100% my fault, and it focused on the areas where I was lathering, and after some research it makes sense. The volcanic ash and the glycolic acid together are great exfoliation, but if you add scrubbing then you're basically double/triple exfoliating, which will of course cause irritation.

I would also be careful using it as a mask for this same reason. Let it rinse off in a shower or something, but don't scrub it! My skin will came out feeling soft and lovely after the mask, no scrubbing required!

unique_id: JACK BLACK-Deep Dive‚Ñ¢ Glycolic Facial Cleanser
review_title: JACK BLACK Deep Dive‚Ñ¢ Glycolic Facial Cleanser
review_text:
This product destroyed my skin. 

I had a deluxe sample that I used semi-regularly over a period of 2 weeks, and was encouraged by the results. Soft skin, reduced blackheads, etc; didn‚Äôt hesitate to order the full size. When it arrived, I upped my usage to 1x daily as recommended. 

Considering the fact that I don‚Äôt have sensitive skin and had been using the product already, when my skin broke out into the most horrific full-face breakouts I have EVER had, I looked to everything else as the potential culprit. It took me almost two months to blame this cleanser‚Äîparticularly since the breakouts got more or less intense depending on where I was in my cycle, so I thought the issue could be more serious/hormonal. Nope. I just get oilier at certain times and this ‚Äúdeep dive‚Äù made a point of accentuating that regularity. With ridiculous numbers of whiteheads and honestly scabby-feeling dry spots. 

The long and the short of it is probably that I am not well-suited to the glycolic acid, and regular use dried the ever-living heck out of my face. I can accept that as my responsibility. But holy heck, be aware that this product can cause such a severe reaction because I wouldn‚Äôt wish it on anyone.

review_text: Love this! Its helped with the tiny hard bumps that nothing else touches. Leaves your face so clean.  It can be drying so don't over do it if you have dry or sensitive skin.
